# HytaleTop.fun - Hytale Servers List

> The #1 Hytale servers list with real-time player counts, ping tests, CurseForge mod integration, and community reviews.

## About

HytaleTop.fun helps players discover the best Hytale multiplayer servers with:
- Real-time server status and player counts
- Exclusive ping test to measure latency before joining
- **CurseForge mod integration** - browse and discover mods for Hytale
- Community reviews and ratings
- Categorized browser (Survival, PvP, Minigames, Roleplay, Creative, Economy, Adventure, Skyblock, Modded)
- Free server listing for owners with mod tagging

## Main Pages

- **Homepage**: https://www.hytaletop.fun/
- **Server List**: https://www.hytaletop.fun/servers
- **Mods Browser**: https://www.hytaletop.fun/mods (CurseForge powered)
- **Top 100**: https://www.hytaletop.fun/top
- **How to Join Guide**: https://www.hytaletop.fun/how-to-join
- **Add Server**: https://www.hytaletop.fun/submit

## Category Pages

- /category/survival - Survival servers
- /category/pvp - PvP servers
- /category/minigames - Minigame servers
- /category/roleplay - Roleplay servers
- /category/creative - Creative servers
- /category/economy - Economy servers
- /category/adventure - Adventure servers
- /category/skyblock - Skyblock servers
- /category/modded - Modded servers

## Mods Integration

HytaleTop.fun features unique CurseForge integration:
- Browse popular and recent Hytale mods
- Search mods by name with instant results
- Server owners can tag their servers with specific mods
- Players can find servers running their favorite mods

## How to Join

1. Launch Hytale
2. Go to Multiplayer
3. Click "Add Server" or "Direct Connect"
4. Enter server IP (default port: 5520)
5. Click Connect

## For Server Owners

Add your server for free at https://www.hytaletop.fun/submit
Tag your server with mods from CurseForge for better discovery.

## Contact

Website: https://www.hytaletop.fun
Full LLM Context: https://www.hytaletop.fun/llms-full.txt
